column1: Hi, we are planning trekking in Sapa on about October 26. Have you guys seen lots of mosquitoes there in few last days? We are concerned on safety as a dengue epidemic rise in Vietnam in October. Thanks in advance for any tips.
Just cover up and use repellent. The local product Remos is safe, it contains only 15% DEET, but is very effective.
Hi, have you been there recently maybe?
2 weeks ago. Ì was on a three week photo trip of the north. Never got bitten, not even once. And we were constantly outside in the wild and rough.Edited: 2 years ago
That’s great to hear :) thank you
We were just there and didn't come across any mosquitos
Same here been here 3 days and been out trekking 2 of the days in the rice paddies and I’ve not seen one mosquito and I always get bitten by them.
